siteDescription: Web developer freelance, lover of self-learning, free knowledge and Javascript.

labels.whatsapp: Send me a message via Whatsapp

one.partOne: Hi, my name is Cristian Santiz, i am
one.partTwo: years old and i am native of Colombia, more specific of a small town located in the north of the country; Sinc√©, they tell him.

paragraphs.two: I'm a ordinary guy in loves with web development.  As self-taught as curious, i always try to be aware of things happening around the world, not just technology. As Bacon would say: "knowledge is power".
paragraphs.three: Philosophy, science, astronomy and spelling are other subjects that I like and that I declare myself a fan of (no more than that).
paragraphs.four: In short, i'm the type of person who likes to know the why of things just to stop feeding their ignorance.
